website_summaries.verdict: This dedicated trail camera and its full HD video quality, dedicated time-lapse mode, long battery life, and sturdy construction make it the perfect solution for watching over your property, garden, or home for extended periods of time.
pros: 0.6 trigger speed for instantly capturing movement
cons: A rechargeable battery option would have been nice, especially since this trail camera is powered by 8 AA batteries

customer_reviews.title: Don't forget to remove the plastic lens covers there's three or four of them
customer_reviews.text: For all those people that said the pictures were not any good you probably forgot to take off the lens protection plastic cover? I have found nothing wrong with these units there are actually a really good buy for the price once you take the time to learn the settings they work perfectly!!
customer_reviews.author: heli54

customer_reviews.title: Great cameras at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and took a chance on getting a 5 pack of cameras and they are very good. I tried them out and at first was disappointed because they didn't work, but then learned that it was operator error. When you get it setup and turned to ON, it acts as though it turns off, but it does indeed take photos.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best of 3 types of trail cams we own
customer_reviews.text: Great camera AND great customer support. After 8 months ours quit working. I contacted seller, was told to mail it to CA (12.00). Two weeks later I recieved a new camera. I do wish, though, the new one had a metal case like my original one did
customer_reviews.author: RobinBT

customer_reviews.title: Not the best pictures
customer_reviews.text: The pictures look like they were taken with a fisheye lens. It works fine otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: mydogateit

customer_reviews.title: This camera is excellent for all my needs
customer_reviews.text: This camera is excellent for all my needs. The picture quality is very good for the price...I would purchase again. I had purchased camera and after using for a short time the screen/pictures had a dark spot that covered most of picture I contacted the seller and I sent camera back and seller replaced very promtly. The seller has wonderful customer service..I am very pleased!!!
customer_reviews.author: SweetT

customer_reviews.title: These do not work properly
customer_reviews.text: The functions work well, easy to program and review. The video is good quality. But the motion detector mode didn't pick up any movement, even with people jumping in front of it. It just randomly recorded nothing, no discernible triggers. Like my bike getting stolen four feet in front of the camera. So i set it to 24 hour time-lapse. As soon as the 'play' countdown ends, it stops recording. So I didn't get the person stealing my handcart on video. Looks like Blaze video also robbed me.
customer_reviews.author: Mumbo Merkaba

customer_reviews.title: Great trail cams!
customer_reviews.text: So far no problems. Easy setup and easy to use. Has so far held up in 20 degree weather in Michigan. Winter is coming soon, will see how well they last. Picture quality is good after getting everything dialed in properly. I would recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Clawbennett

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, but they’re all made in China, so no big deal on the brand. They have all (5) worked flawlessly thus far and have captured all the wildlife my farm has to offer. Easy to setup/use, and the battery life(Energizer Lithiums) are fantastic. Once the cold harsh weather of winter in the Midwest comes and goes, I’ll have a better idea of their year round worthiness. Right now, 5 Stars. I have a card reader that works with my iPhone, so I don’t use the internal viewing screen for checking pics and vids.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis L.

customer_reviews.title: Good value, works very well, a little 90s in usability but still good
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and use right away, clear images (can see the fine hairs on the deers' face as he noses the camera!) and good motion detection. Reasonably easy to use interface but seems like it was designed for 90s UIs. Could use some updating there. Straps for trees are nice but a tad clumsy for me because I am clumsy. Would appreciate knowing about better mounting systems or ideas. But for the price, this is great for figuring out who is stealing your tomatoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: There are only 2 things that I don't like about these cameras. It might be that I don't know what I am doing but I can't find any way to delete photos except one at a time and I can't seem to make it only take one photo per motion detection. As a result, it takes MANY photos that I then have to delete one at a time. I have looked around online but can't find where these issues are addressed. Beyond that, I am very happy with these cameras and I use them around my house at night since I live in the country.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl remmerde

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to put outside so I can keep an eye on my dogs and chickens. I wish the battery life would last a little longer (I bought the BEST and most expensive, recommended batteries for it) Not sure what setting to put it on in order for them to last longer. But the cameras are great! I just watch them every few days. Clarity is amazing! The range is great! Definitely, recommend!
customer_reviews.author: iflyliljets

customer_reviews.title: Security cam
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for people, not animals. It works well. Doesn't really have great detail if the people are far away, but it works. Make sure you put it where the animals can't block it. lol Very easy to use and set up. Battery life depends on your settings. It's obviously going to use more power if you have it set to record video instead of just taking pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Way cool!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to place in my back yard because I have so many wild critters that roam through. I have seen 7 deer at one time in my yard and I've seen raccoons as well. I would like to see them without scaring them away. I truly love animals and I'm afraid they will not be around long with all the land clearing and building going on near me, nGreat product!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Great deal...
customer_reviews.text: I live on a large piece of property and need to monitor the wildlife. These are easy to program and use and take great video. Small and lightweight, they are easy to attach to trees or posts. The black LED's are a nice feature, as you cannot see them when they activate, so people or animals don't know they're being photographed. I've had them for a few months now, and have had no failures. Will be ordering more. I highly recommend these cams for those who need a lot property coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Locke

customer_reviews.title: Grainy videos
customer_reviews.text: Videos are not good quality for a 16 mp camera. Disappointed. 12 mp Stealth camera videos are far superior to the ones this camera takes. Would not recommend this camera
customer_reviews.author: nc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really excellent trail camera, especially for the price. The no glow infrared lights are not visible at night. I bought this specifically for home security, to catch some teenagers messing around my house at night. Mission accomplished thanks to this camera! The camera and video quality is excellent as well. Would buy this again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: WinoGuy

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and set  up
customer_reviews.text: I"ve owned other trial cameras. While good, they were fussy to use ands set up. This one is a breeze. Set up took less than ten minutes and the first run of photos was excellent. The price is reasonable and the overall design and quality superb. Have not used all the settings, or picture modes, so this is a preliminary review. I will add to it later when I try all the features.
customer_reviews.author: George Anast

customer_reviews.title: ... camera is flawlessly for all my needs at a great price. The pictures and videos are very clear
customer_reviews.text: This camera is flawlessly for all my needs at a great price. The pictures and videos are very clear. Easy to use and view pictures on PC via USB downloading for hunters. It's easy to use, has a very long battery life.The seller has wonderful customer service. I highly recommend this product !
customer_reviews.author: Sound

customer_reviews.title: Video length settings ignored
customer_reviews.text: This camera does a good job of detecting and recording video, but the settings for the length of time for the video are ignored. A 30 second video length setting only recorded for 4 seconds even though subsequent 4 videos showed that the motion continued for longer than 30 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Eric G. Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: All great things to say about this product. Good design, works well, easy to use, accurately described, excellent value. Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Boris Zarpova

customer_reviews.title: Negative reviews seem to be without merit
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were well written and easy to follow. All the parameters were quickly set via the menu. The images and video were great. I used it as a security camera. Within the first 24 hours it documented unwanted activity that another business owner and I were able to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: J and B

customer_reviews.title: overall good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 5 pack of these cameras for hunting and scouting. They worked well in Alaska conditions for the most part and I was happy with the quality of video and pictures, and battery life in the cold wet environment. However, after 3 months of using these units in the field one camera completely failed and only comes up with a blank white screen when turned to on position. Not sure if I will buy more until further testing of the remaining 3 cameras. One camera was stolen. I recommend buying lock cables for field use. I own several different brands of trail cameras and other than the one mechanical failure they worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Diana P.

customer_reviews.title: These are cheap garbage.
customer_reviews.text: This camera is not worth the money to buy it. I bought it last summer and used it for about 2 months and that's all I got out of it. I would not recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This works great during the day but it has to be about 15 to 20 feet from your target area to see anything at night.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pictures
customer_reviews.text: I like how you can review the photos right on the camera
customer_reviews.author: Robert G

customer_reviews.title: Video wasn't working
customer_reviews.text: My camera took great pics but I went to use the video and got nothing but popping, clicking, and screen was black. It took great pictures, just don't understand why the video wasn't working. My SD card was fine
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Ok So Far
customer_reviews.text: Ok so far, but not as clear of a picture as I was hoping for at night. Maybe I need to make some adjustments. Possibly a too wide of an angle lens also. Animals I am picking up look too small. Would like a little more of a close up.
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: Four out of Five arrived broken.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the five pack of trail cameras. Heard great reviews about them. When they arrived I could only get one out of the four to turn on and work. If all five wouldn’t turn on I would assume it was something I was doing wrong but one turned on like it was supposed to. The one camera that worked takes great video and pictures. The other four will not turn on. Called customer service... no answer. Emailed customer support for blaze video... no answer. Ended up returning them for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable pictures
customer_reviews.text: This camera was purchased to replace a Primos Truth Cam, that failed to function this year, after 3 years of service. I have to be honest, I think this camera takes better or at least comparable pictures than the Primos. Easy to use and so far looks like battery life will be alright as well!
customer_reviews.author: BigAck

customer_reviews.title: Catching the bear in the act!
customer_reviews.text: Had a bear tearing down bird feeders. Got the camcorder to catch him in the act. He stopped coming but we enjoy seeing the critters that come out at night.
customer_reviews.author: Paul's mom

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera for the Price
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very pleased with his new Trail Camera. He's wanting a second one and will likely order one just like this one.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Security system backup
customer_reviews.text: This is everything i thought and hoped it would be
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing camera. Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Works extremely well. Great quality and amazing footage. Amazing in the dark. Works great in rain. A lot of setting for what ever you need. Only down side is that battery life is up to the battery manufacturer that you chose to use. That is not this products fault. I just wish it was rechargeable, not a huge deal.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth getting the multipack
customer_reviews.text: I have spent a lot of money on Cuddy back cameras. He seem to take better quality photos. Just having a little trouble figuring out the video . I am sure if I loves hoarder I would figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: great range and clarity
customer_reviews.text: If I had a complaint is that it is TOO good and picks up any movement out to 100 yards in daylight. Good features such as time lapse. It is easy to program
customer_reviews.author: Daniel V.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for price
customer_reviews.text: They take quality pictures for the price and overall great trailcamera just to see what deer u have on your land. Would recommend to anyone who wants a agood camera but doesn’t want to pay 450$ just for one camera.
customer_reviews.author: parker

customer_reviews.title: Decent camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: Decent camera for the price. Good- true no glow ir, easy set up, lcd screen, profile is low, Bad- mounting options, lock/security, camera installed on the door. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Chickadee3

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work well in low light
customer_reviews.text: Used the cameras for deer scouting 2 of them stopped working just after my 30 day return was up . The cameras perform poorly in low light conditions. They will take numerous pictures that are too dark to see untill it gets pitch dark and then the flash works
customer_reviews.author: Chuck P.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and great images! Video too!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic little cameras! So easy to set up and use. Very good pictures even in the pitch dark. So cool to set it up to take videos! We’ve seen fox, coyote, deer already on our images!
customer_reviews.author: Freeda Powers

customer_reviews.title: great clear pictures
customer_reviews.text: easy to use good directions pictures were great will buy another GOOD JOB
customer_reviews.author: Tom Whiteman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: So far they are working as advertised. Best feature on these is the inside screen has a viewer. You can actually check your pictures without pulling the card.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: no audio
customer_reviews.text: not a good feeling to realize this does not record audio. that should have been easier to find out
customer_reviews.author: Zap

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I’ve used it to watch the woods in my back yard as the bears are starting to move around. I am getting ready to set it up by my hummingbird feeders. I would recommend this to anyone and am getting ready to order another
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: 100% worth the buy.
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality camera and an even better price. Takes amazing pictures and video both day and night. Easy to setup, easy to use, and most important easy on the pocket! I will buy these 100 times over before buying another expensive camera that can’t outperform these.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Nothing bad to say performed as stated. Did exactly what it was suppose to do and was out in stormy and rainy weather without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Works Great ! love it
customer_reviews.text: Work's perfect ! Saw a 8 point deer the first night we had it out . Great price , works flawlessly. I highly recommend this product !
customer_reviews.author: L.Britt

customer_reviews.title: great pics but it doesn't work all the time
customer_reviews.text: I have had Bushnell game cameras for over a decade but this one stops working. The batteries are ok because when I open it the display lights up. Upon checking the sd card the camera just stops taking pictures or doesn't take any at all.
customer_reviews.author: Susan H Moran

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to capture critters outside.
customer_reviews.text: This easy to assemble video is great for capturing pictures of what might be living in your back woods. It works well and the images are well defined.
customer_reviews.author: Diana B

customer_reviews.title: very clear pictures and videos
customer_reviews.text: love the versatility of pics and videos and timing options.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S. Fiedler

customer_reviews.title: Better advertising
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had the chance to try it yet. But I will say that myself and others that I showed the ad to thought it was six cameras for the price not a single camera
customer_reviews.author: James Ingold

customer_reviews.title: Poor picture quality
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality was worst than my 10 year old Bushnell camera and night pics was even worst
customer_reviews.author: Bill Thigpin

customer_reviews.title: This is a great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.text: They take great pictures, even at night. Good for capturing wildlife pics. And its battery usage is phenomenal.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Videos freeze half way through
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I purchased the videos record however freeze half way through viewing, I have to send the second one back. Maybe there is s solution but I have not found it, frustrating. Not going to get another one.
customer_reviews.author: Al Morad

customer_reviews.title: A way to report scams.
customer_reviews.text: Being you have no way to report a fraud attempt against you I’m useing this. 206 462 4183 attempted to scam me for 77.00 dollars for an Amazon gift card. Yuu should have a way to report scam attempts to you.
customer_reviews.author: carles feldman

customer_reviews.title: The BlazeVideo digital trail camera is very good for wildlife observing
customer_reviews.text: The BlazeVideo digital trail camera is very good for wildlife observing. All of our family members like it . We use it as a sports camera and for camping. It's really easy to use and I especially like its light weight. It's really a good idea for birthday and Christmas gift. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Much to complicated to use. Could be much simpler. I ended up tossing it.
customer_reviews.author: walter t  stamm

customer_reviews.title: Not that good
customer_reviews.text: Change them from the older style not as friendly user
customer_reviews.author: Chris daugherty🧐

customer_reviews.title: great communication, excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Very fast shipping, great communication, excellent product. Husband was very happy
customer_reviews.author: Brandie Kornelje-Cogswell

customer_reviews.title: Why pay more. This is a great camera
customer_reviews.text: I use this for monitoring my deer feeder and it works great. Easy to set and picture quality is better than I expected. It is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: garyco4

customer_reviews.title: Would not power on.
customer_reviews.text: Product did not work. Brand new batteries and wouldn’t power on.
customer_reviews.author: Jason B. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Options
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my husband. He absolutely loves it! He likes all the setting options so her can get the best pics.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter in the making

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great! Fun to see who visits my yard at night!! Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kerrigan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Camera
customer_reviews.text: Camera works great, no problems at all, would be nice if they supplied power adapter. Other than that Great unit.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Great for secondary home security
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. put it on a tripod and use it around the homestead.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Davis

customer_reviews.title: ... had a few game cameras but this camera is great because it is small and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have had a few game cameras but this camera is great because it is small and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Hill

customer_reviews.title: Night vision sucks
customer_reviews.text: The night vision is horrible. I wished I knew this before I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: wayne giles

customer_reviews.title: Really good nighttime pics
customer_reviews.text: Really good nighttime pics. Using this product to keep an eye on a fence between properties and it is serving it's purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer73

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2 for Christmas Gifts.  Neither worked.  Hmmm...
customer_reviews.text: I did my Christmas shopping early. Just gave them to my friend this last weekend in November as an early Christmas gift. Several guys -even an IT guy- tried to get them to work & NEITHER OF THE 2 I BOUGHT IN AUGUST worked. AT ALL!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't buy this camera
customer_reviews.text: The set up is not clear. It does not take any pictures when "on". It makes clicking noises and takes pictures only on "setup" mode. I'm not the only one to say this in a review so be warned.
customer_reviews.author: Kevlaur3

customer_reviews.title: So far the camera wont stop making clicking noises? ...
customer_reviews.text: So far the camera wont stop making clicking noises ? worked for a few pictures then non stop loud clicking,including flashing red light. Might have to send back If I cant figure it out ?
customer_reviews.author: keepitrockin

customer_reviews.title: the camera's price is good! I like that you can set the video ...
customer_reviews.text: the camera's price is good! I like that you can set the video recording to happen for different durations. The day time pictures are good but night photos are almost always fuzzy/blurry. I haven't gotten one good night time picture of wildlife. For the price, the camera is good.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: The user manual that came with it was useless. I tried to prop it in a window ...
customer_reviews.text: This produce was very disappointing! It worked for about three times that I used it, then just quit. The user manual that came with it was useless. I tried to prop it in a window -- inside -- it worked, then stopped filming stuff outside the window. The "black" belt it came with made it very obvious that I had hung the camera in my tree. Overall this was a bust. I'm really sorry I waisted my hard earned money.
customer_reviews.author: James E. Radford

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not catching no videos or pictures put the camera on my feeder the corn is gone but no pictures
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Crap camera
customer_reviews.text: There is no light so photos at night are dark dark and can't be seen. Also randomly take pics and video of nothing
customer_reviews.author: Craig A. Carlson

product_meta.title: Game Camera & Deer Hunting Trail Cam with Night Vision 20MP Photo 1080P HD H.264 MP4 Video No Flash 940nm Infrared Waterproof Motion Activated for Wildlife Tracking & Home Security Photo & Video Model
product_meta.description:
Color:No Glow Trail CameraMax. Pixel Size: 4608x3456
Waterproof: IP66
Lens: F=2.0; FOV=105°; Auto IR-Cut
IR: 70ft/21m with 36pcs no glow & no flash 940nm IR LEDs
LCD Screen: 2.31" TFT color screen
Keypad: 6 Keys, 1 Switch
Memory: SD Card (8MB~128GB not included) 
Picture Size: 20MP;16MP; 12MP; 8MP; 5MP; 3MP; 1MP
Video Size: 1920×1080: 25fps; 1280x720: 30fps; 720x480: 30fps; 640x480: 30fps; 320x240: 30fps
PIR Sensitivity: High/Normal/Low
PIR Sensing Distance: 70ft/21m (Below 77°F/25°C at the Normal Level) 
PIR Sensing Angle: 70° under side motion sensors enabled. 
Operation Mode: Day/Night
Trigger Time: 0.5 Second 
Trigger Interval: 0sec. - 60min; Programmable
Shooting Numbers: 01-05
Video Length: 3sec-5min.; Programmable
Camera + Video: Take picture firstly then video
Playback Zoom In: 1~8 Times
Time Stamp: On/Off
Timer: On/Off; Timer Set
Password: 4-Digit Numbers
Device Serial No. : 4-Digit Numbers
Time Lapse: 1 Second~24 Hours
Language: English
Power Supply: 8xAA(not included)
Stand-by Current: 0.15mA
Stand-by Time: 8Months 
Auto Power Off: Auto power off in 5 minutes while no keypad controlling
Low Battery Alarm: 4.2V
Interface: USB; SD Card Slot; 12V DC External (12V/2A input with 4.0x1.7mm male end) 
Mounting: Strap; Tripod Nail (Thread: UNC 1/4-20) 
Operation Temperature: -4~+140°F/-20 ~+60°C
Operation Humidity: 5% ~ 95%
Certificate: FCC & CE & RoHS
Package list: Digital camera, Strap, USB cable, User Manual

NOTE:
1. As for reserve battery life, Max 30s for every video can be recorded at night.
2. The power time depends on the quality of batteries. If you take or record many pictures/videos in short time, the power will fall out quickly.
feature_bullets: 1.HD Image & Video and PIR Function: Capture max 20MP images and 1080P videos H.264 encoding MP4 format which can be fast share to YouTube or Facebook In "Cam + Video" mode, images and videos could work together at every trigger. SD card support up to 128GB(not included in package).65°PIR sensor detect wide and night vision up to 70ft/21m.

2. Stealth Design & Energy-efficient: Camo design makes the camera stealth for wildlife observing and researching of wild animals; ideal for riding, camping and exploring as sport camera, even role as security camera for home and office. Operating temperature is between -4~+140°F/-20 ~+60°C. Long in-field battery life in standby mode, up to 3 - 6 months with 8*AA batteries and Auto power off in 5 minutes while no keypad controlling, more energy-efficient.

3. Time Lapse: Trail hunting camera takes pictures/videos at specified interval automatically and constantly, which is useful when observing cold-blooded animals like snakes and the growing process of plant, flower, birds nest. When monitoring certain point like parking or yard. This feature can be used with Timer to meet your timetable.

4. Password Set and Serial Number function: this game trail camera allows you to set up a password to protect your camera from unauthorized users and the Serial Number function enables you to code locations in the photos. The Serial Number function helps multi-camera users identify the location when reviewing the photos.

5. Easy to Use: Unique button design, embedded 2.31-inch LCD screen, simple menu/settings, easy to get started. Quick trigger time in 0.5 second (pre-boot 0.2s under side motion sensors enabled), trigger distance up to 70ft/21m below 77°F/25°C at normal, miss nothing at all.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars335 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
